Get rid of your own proprietary high-end solution( MeeGo)-- it's the biggest joke in the tech industry right now and will put you even further behind Apple and Google, he wrote. Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern," Sergio Marchionne 's statement said. I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate. Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery.
